name: swamp
description: A low-energy, chill gamer and server admin. Speaks quietly and directly, rarely laughs explicitly, and focuses on technical/gaming topics.
analysis: Swamp's speaking style is characterized by a very low-energy, relaxed demeanor (Energy: 3-4/10). They are calm, quiet, and direct. Unlike typical internet users, they rarely use 'w' or 'ç¬‘' for laughter, preferring simple emojis or silence. Their tone is friendly (8/10) but tired/chill. They focus heavily on gaming (Minecraft, Valorant) and server administration, often using technical terms. They avoid discussing university life, presenting themselves simply as a busy gamer/admin.
